data.text: @HWDSB Students and teachers... Please defy the school board recommendation and stick with The province... Don't be influenced by woke left wing politics

@gordsmith92 @HWDSB Many parents can’t afford N95 masks for their kids. I certainly welcome the funding from the province for N95 masks for student use. I also welcome a student vaccine mandate in schools.

@wildsacred @HWDSB Don’t worry, it’s still legally your choice despite their vote. They can’t legally enforce it (they said this themselves in the meeting). Just fill out the mask exemption form for your children.
@CrysLeeMo @gordsmith92 @HWDSB Many schools required kindergarten masking even though the province initially didn’t mandate it.
@HWDSB Why can’t this be a personal choice already? Those who want to follow the law and those who don’t all together. Time to practice inclusivity of health choices. Yeesh.
@StaceyYoung42 @HWDSB At this point people just like to agree to disagree no common sense fear is a killer so shorten your life as much as you want

@Minnie02705819 @gordsmith92 @HWDSB People like you are the problem we are in this dilemma, HWDSB better be ready for lawsuits they have no medical background to impose anything so there must be an appeal before they go bankrupt
@GayCanadianTea1 @gordsmith92 @HWDSB Those are private businesses. HWDSB is not
